thread.title: 40. A Long and Happy Life EP - Delta Rae
thread.title_full: 40. A Long and Happy Life EP - Delta Rae

title: 40. A Long and Happy Life EP - Delta Rae
text: by Corynn Taylor sister had me wait up to buy it first thing... I've heard the songs live and they were incredible so the studio versions should be no different. Just buy it. Awesome songs Do your self a favor. . . by Andrew M. Barber Do your self a favor download this EP then download every other album Delta Rae has put out. If you love good music strong vocals stunningly beautiful lyrics. This band (and this EP) is your new best friend. Get to it! You won't be disappointed. Heartfelt by donniboy The reason I love these guys so much is because every song comes from the heart. Upbeat or ballad, each song is felt. This EP is everything I expected and more. I can't wait for the tour! See you in Dallas! Biography Formed: 2009 in Durham, NC Genre: Alternative Years Active: '10s Earthy familial alt-pop outfit Delta Rae skillfully juggle gospel-tinged country-rock, sensual blue-eyed soul, and harmony-laden Americana, resulting in an infectious, radio-ready sound that falls somewhere between Nickel Creek and Adele. Formed in 2009 as a four-piece around the talents of siblings Ian, Eric, and Brittany Hölljes along with Elizabeth Hopkins, the North Carolina-based band expanded to a sextet the following year with the additions of Mike McKee and Grant Emerson.
